Restricted  
            NO.CAS-7(9)/2008/Div.I(Weapon) 
              BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING (I-III Floor), JANPATH BHAVAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated : 31 /12/2009 
 
 
AVSEC Circular No. 22 /2009 
 
 
Subject :  Permission for Carriage of Arms & Ammunition by The General     
                 Manager, Rifle Factory 
 
 
A copy of DGCA permit number 568-AA/2009, issued under reference No. 
8/98/2005-IR dated 23-112009 regarding authorization to the General Manager, Rifle 
Factory Ishapore, P.O: Nawabganj – Ishapore, Distt: 24 Parganas (North), West Bengal 
for carriage of arms and ammunition, consigned to the licensed dealers and  Central / 
State Govt. Departments by air to/from any point  within India, is forwarded herewith for 
information and necessary action by all concerned. 
 
2. 
Unless suspended or revoked earlier, this permit shall remain valid w.e.f 01-01-
2010 to 31-12-2010. 
 
3. 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Encl : As above. 
 
 
(M. Malaviya, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
